channel.title: Dark bow double hit
channel.description: Ok, since I'm kinda lazy and I've seen other server's with double hitting dark bow, does someone hve the animation and code for the dark bow so it double hits? For now I simply replaced dark bow with crystal bow so it fire crystal arrows, but is there a code someone could give for double hitting arrows?

item.title: Dark bow double hit
item.dc:creator: @owningme1 owningme1
item.description:
@owningme1 wrote:

You mean you just renamed the crystal bow “Dark Bow”? If you want to “Make” a darkbow, then… Wow. Ask Silab… She knows how to apparently :o it’s all client-side… I personally dont know much about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark bow double hit
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Eragon Mod Eragon
item.description:
@Mod_Eragon wrote:

no no, I mean I replaced darkbow as crystal bow so darkbow does what crystal bow did like with the glowy arrow. So is there a code to make the actual dark bow instead of replacing crystal bow?

Read full topic

item.title: Dark bow double hit
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Sometimes it double hits sometimes it dosnt… If ur server has working dark bow, it should hit double some times…
it dosnt always hit double…

Read full topic
